rules_text:
Epic [i](When you cast this spell, for the rest of the game, you can’t cast spells. At the beginning of each of your upkeeps, copy this spell except for its epic ability. A copy of a permanent spell becomes a token.)[/i]
You may have The Everything enter the battlefield as a copy of any permanent on the battlefield, except it’s a Horror in addition to its other types.
notes:
Inspiration — Cosmic Horror, Old Ones

Mechanical Uniqueness — Permanent with epic
